Reviews.Title: “Good location”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights vacationing dallas hotel modern quiet breakfast delicious served eggs waffles sausage fruitthe location plus 15 miles dfw airport 6 miles kennedy 6th floor museum negative hotels fault gps address try punching tom landry highway dfw pike stay

Reviews.Title: “Great price and location from downtown Dallas”
Reviews.Author: GoHawksAnkenyIowa
Reviews.Content: stay close downtown mavericks game downtown hotels pricy looked little farther found front desk helpful giving directions downtown 10 minutes hotel clean reason didnt 5 outdoor pool dirty leaves didnt look cleaned awhile hot tub cold complimentary breakfast morning walk parking lot taco bell kfc sonic
